In excellent condition, this one owner Nissan bakkie is mechanically perfect and the interior and exterior has been very well looked after. Features include: Canopy, rubberized loadbin, tow bar, aircon, power steering, aftermarket radio and more

attributes.description: This amazing Haval H2 has every feature in the book for an amazing price. Android auto, reverse camera, sunroof and leather interior all for under R300 000 is a bargain. This H2 is in immaculate condition and is as good as new. It has the remainder of the factory warranty and service plan still in place and is spotless. This H2 really is a smooth drive and all the features will make sure you drive in style and luxury. Just some of the features include: Sunroof, reverse camera, android radio, navigation, cruise control, leather interior, auto lights and wipers, dash cam and more

This X5 is spotless and as good as new. attributes.description: A 6speed CVT gearbox with Sports Mode coupled to Mitsubishis 2.0litre MIVEC petrol engine. The latest model offers cuttingedge technology to deliver a bold action adventure compact SUV that takes you beyond the everyday. The stimulating design concept of the allnew Eclipse Cross brings the new compact SUV into the modern age, combining the latest styling design with incredible driving dynamics and innovative, intuitive safety technology. The allnew models vibrant styling expresses a fresh sportiness and stylishness, making a bold statement on the road. Like the ring of sunlight from behind the moon in a full eclipse, the sharply sculpted character line makes the Eclipse Cross appear as if the body was carved from a single block of metal. On the inside the Eclipse Cross offers complete style and comfort with bolstered seats giving the driver relaxed support and unchallenged visibility. (OTR costs are excluded R5500)
